checker.sourceparser
Class CppSourceParser

java.lang.Object
  checker.sourceparser.CppSourceParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
SourceParser
public class CppSourceParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements SourceParser

CppSourceFileParsing takes c/c++ source file content and parses it for comments and references.
